Objects.Name: madame zayla wagon
Objects.Description: Madame Zayla's Wagon rests here in the middle of the woods.

Objects.Name: small round table
Objects.Description: A small round wooden table sits in the center of the wagon.

Objects.Name: crystal ball madame zayla's
Objects.Description: Madame Zayla's crystal ball glows upon the table.

Objects.Name: trickling brook
Objects.Description: The brook trickles by, clear and clean.

Objects.Name: small platform stage
Objects.Description: A small platform stage has been erected for the actors.

Objects.Name: line children
Objects.Description: A line of children run past you from the face painter's booth.

Objects.Name: hot pie covered
Objects.Description: A small hot pie has been dropped on the ground.

Objects.Name: picnic table
Objects.Description: Long wooden picnic tables are scattered about.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The tables are about eight feet in length, made from some wood that has agedbeyond recognition.  The tables are still serviceable, though barely.

Objects.Name: grill black iron
Objects.Description: A black iron grill steams with heat.

Objects.Name: water keg wooden water
Objects.Description: A wooden keg stands on stilts next to the grill.

Objects.Name: puppet castle
Objects.Description: A wooden puppet castle painted to look like stone is here.

Objects.Name: set colored balls
Objects.Description: Don't slip! A set of colored balls have been left on the ground.
